lines.text: [on being told he's been selected as gay man of the year]
I haven't done anything or anyone to deserve this.
[When Peter clicks his pen, it's supposed to signal to Oscar that he's rambling]
Hey, you have a Buddha! Oh, I love Buddhas.
[Peter clicks his pen]
They're like bright, cheery, naked Asian Santas.
[Sound of clicking pen]
You know, I had a buddy in college whose name was Bob and we used to call him "Buddha Bob" because he was kind of fat and he liked to walk around naked.
[More pen clicking]
We used to rub his belly for luck.
[Frantic pen clicking. Oscar gets the hint]
Anyway... I love Buddha.
[awkward pause]
He rocks.
You've made your big gay bed and now you must slumber gaily in it!
[viewing a photograph of the Bosnian flag painted on someone's nude bottom]
I had no idea things were so hairy in Bosnia.
...she has an ass so sexy, I struggle to understand it.
[Standing outside the cafe, Oscar is looking very ill]
Oh, are you okay?
Mouth... watering.

God, I knew that Tuna Melt tasted funny. I'm lucky, I can eat just about anything. Know why? Cause my mother was a horrible cook. She used to make this thing that smelled like a wet dog and old tennis shoes and...
[Oscar retches]
Oh, sorry.
Would you excuse me for a second?

[Oscar kneels over and is violently sick]
Boy that felt good!
Don't worry you'll be alright in a minute.
[Amy pauses then kneels over and is sick as well]
It just doesn't get better than this!
[after Amy accidentally hits Oscar]
Did you hurt yourself?
No, no... YOU hurt me!

[on the phone to his shocked but supportive mother]
I'm not gay. I just have to pretend to be gay for work.
Mum's the word. The word is mum.
How are your balls?
They're fine. Thanks for asking.
[Peter is standing with a tub of hair gel and a weird hairdo]
What the hell happened to your head?
I've been here for nine hours. I got bored.
You're a very strange man. Now, will you get out of my apartment?
What happened? Oscy... Oscy... it's six in the morning.

It was awful, okay? As soon as we left the gallery, our cab caught on fire. THEN, she elbowed me in the face. THEN, we both threw up. THEN, she slammed a car handle into my balls, okay? The entire night was a total disaster.
You're in love with her.
Pretty much.
Do you have any idea what toilet paper feels like in Egypt?
So I take it you have kissed a woman before?
Not the right one.
[upon meeting her boyfriends wife]
I handled that well, didn't I? I'm still in one piece.
Yes, very well.
[amy starts to walk away]
Where are you going?
To get really *really* drunk.
I'm never going to have sex again!
Oh, of course you will. Just maybe not with a woman.
What's good?
Tuna melt.
Ohhh... what else?
Tuna melt.
What do you think?
Yeah, two tuna melts.
You do know there are other fish in the sea?
But what if you found *the* fish?
God, I swear Oscar, if you weren't gay, I'd have to kill you.
Gay? I'm not gay. I didn't... gay.
Now... why don't you go put on those red bikini briefs that I gave you? I love the way your butt looks in them.
Olivia, I really don't want to.
Charles, What happens when I'm unhappy? What happens?
Fine... But not the red ones... they bind
I'm Batman.

[Peter is stood with a tub of hair gel and a weird hairdo]
What the hell happened to your hair?
You were gone for nine hours. I got bored. What happened?
It was a disaster. First our cab exploded, then I got hit in the face, then we both threw up, *then* she rammed a car handle into my balls. The whole night was a disaster.
You fell in love with her.
Pretty much.

Oskie, I'm a professional. I went to graduate school. I did all-nighters my senior year. I did a semester in Egypt. Do you have any idea what toilet paper feels like in Egypt? I delivered cinnamon rolls on a truck with bad suspension for three years! Do you know what that does to your kidneys? My poor kidneys! My freaking kidneys! My poor freaking kidneys! My freaking, scarred, bruised kidneys!
Don't make me make you my prison bitch.
